class_notes: This class is for traditional BSN semester 2 students only.
course_description: This course emphasizes pharmacotherapeutic agents used in the treatment of illness and the promotion, maintenance, and restoration of wellness in individuals across the lifespan. Emphasis is placed on principles of pharmacokinetics, pharmacodynamics, and pharmacogenetics for selected illnesses.
prerequisites: NRSG 310 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 3751, Section #: 100, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MTh 1-2:15p, Instructor: K. Mueller, Status: Open
